
# my-node-app

Convert your node app as module


## Installation

```bash
  npm install my-node-app
  yarn add my-node-app
```
    
## Usage/Examples
Create "app.js" file in src directory 

```javascript
const express = require('express');
const app = express();
/* - - - - - -
Your code
- - - - - - */
module.exports = {
    app
}
```
